question: You are renting an apartment. Write a letter to your landlord regarding a noise problem from your neighbors. Include the following in your letter:– What is the problem?– What have you done about it?– What would you like the landlord to do?
text: I am writing this to complain about the noise issue I am facing from the tenants living in apartment number 301, next to ours. I hear the weird voices and dancing music all  night, every day.

Actually, I have been living here for 4 years and never faced any problem during that time, but last month, the new people came to  flat 301 and since then, it has become arduous to live here. It seems like they party every night and plays music with unbearable sounds. I had a complaint about them a couple of weeks ago but not the appropriate action has been taken yet. I believe you must have received complaints from other tenants too as they are becoming a headache for almost everyone living in the building.
I strongly assert that the problem must be addressed at the earliest. Appropriate action should be taken against them or unfortunately, I will have to leave the apartment even if I don't want to.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

error_list.error_des: It seems that the verb plays does not agree with the subject. Consider changing the verb form.
